sourcesContent:
<template>
{{event.name}}
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';
export default {

 data:() => ({
  event: {

  }
 }),

 methods: {
  getEvent() {
   this.event = this.EVENTS[this.$route.params['id']-1]
  }
 },

 computed: {
   ...mapGetters([
     'EVENTS',
   ]),
 },

 mounted() {
  this.getEvent()
 },



}
</script>

<style>

</style>
